text: Sibusiso Busi Moyo (1961 - 20 January 2021) was a Zimbabwean politician and Army major general. He was Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Trade from 2017 until his death. Moyo was born in Mberengwa, Zimbabwe. Moyo died on 20 January 2021 from COVID-19 in Harare, Zimbabwe. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Zimbabwean politicians Category:Generals Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Zimbabwe
title: Sibusiso Moyo
